name: 洛伦佐·马特利
name_full: 洛伦佐·马特利 Lorenzo Martelli
introduction: Lorenzo trained at Webber Douglas after graduating from Oxford University, and has since appeared across TV, Film, Commercials and Theatre, from primetime British TV through to streetdance-infused Shakespeare. Born and raised in Liverpool and based in London, his work encompasses drama, comedy, improvisation and classical work, with a focus on memorable, high-energy character roles. He is a champion of diversity and inclusion across the Arts.
